geomatics.drawing.geometries

Class ToolLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • geomatics.drawing.geometries.ObjectFundamentals
      • geomatics.drawing.geometries.ToolLine

  • public class ToolLine
extends ObjectFundamentals
    Class for ToolLines that stores line coordinates and provides methods for creating drawable line geometries for the ToolDrawPanel, or for importing/exporting the line coordinates. Inherits from ObjectFundamenals.
    Author:
    heol1015

      Stores the first and the last ToolPoint of a ToolLine object
